title: Cleanse bug
body: Whenever I use cleanse it doesn't disable all champions in my line of sight, make me invincible for the duration of the match and nerf Yasuo, in the video it doesn't do any of this!

replies.body: Ok this bug isn't fixed yet? +1 for awareness

OMG im not the only one experiencing this problem??? Valve really needs to do a better job improving their game, if they keep up work like this dota 2 is going to completely die off. like the awp is bugged and all the russians are bad at the game, AND DONT GET ME STARTED ON ALL THE KIDS THINKING THEY CAN USE THE DEAG.

{{summoner:1}} Ah that's user error. Here is a post to help you{{summoner:1}}
